MemberSignature.Value: public void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship (string targetForestName, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction, string trustPassword);

.method public hidebysig instance void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship(string targetForestName, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction, string trustPassword) cil managed
Public Sub CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship (targetForestName As String, direction As TrustDirection, trustPassword As String)
public: void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship(System::String ^ targetForestName, System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectory::TrustDirection direction, System::String ^ trustPassword);

param.name: targetForestName
param.span: The DNS name of the forest that the trust is created with.

span.span: The DNS name of the forest that the trust is created with.

param.name: direction
param.span: One of the members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this forest.

span.span: One of the members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this forest.

param.name: trustPassword
param.span: The password for the trust.

span.span: The password for the trust.

summary.span: Creates the local side of a trust relationship with the specified forest.

span.span: Creates the local side of a trust relationship with the specified forest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método crea un lado de una relación de confianza.This method creates one side of a trust relationship. La relación de confianza no se establece hasta que se han creado ambos lados de la relación de confianza.The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created. El `trustPassword` parámetro asocia una contraseña con la confianza creada.The `trustPassword` parameter associates a password with the created trust. Cuando se crea el otro lado de la relación de confianza, se proporciona la misma contraseña y, a continuación, se enlazan las dos confianzas locales entre sí.When the other side of the trust is created, the same password is provided and the two local trusts are then bound to each other. Para crear mediante programación ambos lados de una relación de confianza en una única llamada al método, utilice el método.To programmatically create both sides of a trust relationship in a single method call, use the method.

span.span: The trust relationship already exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método crea ambos lados de una relación de confianza con una única llamada al método.This method creates both sides of a trust relationship with a single method call. El método se usa para crear un solo lado de una relación de confianza.The method is used to create only one side of a trust.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando se elimina un lado de una relación de confianza, ya no se establece la relación de confianza.When one side of a trust relationship is deleted, the trust is no longer established. remarks.format: ## Remarks Puede encontrar los controladores de dominio detectables consultando los registros SRV de DNS.You can find discoverable domain controllers by querying DNS SRV records. Este método devuelve sólo los catálogos globales que registre un genérico, específico de sitio, el registro de SRV de GC.Only global catalogs that register a generic, non-site-specific, GC SRV record are returned by this method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection FindAllDiscoverableGlobalCatalogs(string siteName) cil managed
Public Function FindAllDiscoverableGlobalCatalogs (siteName As String) As GlobalCatalogCollection

param.name: siteName
param.span: The name of the site to search.

span.span: The name of the site to search.

summary.span: Finds all of the discoverable global catalogs in this forest in a specified site.

span.span: Finds all of the discoverable global catalogs in this forest in a specified site.

returns.span: A that contains the collection of global catalogs that were found.

span.span: A that contains the collection of global catalogs that were found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Puede encontrar los catálogos globales detectables consultando los registros SRV de DNS.You can find discoverable global catalogs by querying DNS SRV records. Si un catálogo global no registra un registro SRV de GC para el sitio especificado, este método, no se devolverá incluso si el catálogo global se encuentra físicamente dentro de ese sitio.If a global catalog does not register a GC SRV record for the specified site, it will not be returned by this method, even if the global catalog is physically located within that site. Se devolverán todos los catálogos globales que registran un registro SRV de GC para el sitio especificado por este método, aunque es posible que no se encuentra físicamente dentro de ese sitio.All global catalogs which register a GC SRV record for the specified site will be returned by this method, even if they might not be physically located within that site.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool GetSelectiveAuthenticationStatus(string targetForestName) cil managed
Public Function GetSelectiveAuthenticationStatus (targetForestName As String) As Boolean

param.name: targetForestName
param.span: The DNS name of the with which the inbound trust relationship exists.

span.span: The DNS name of the with which the inbound trust relationship exists.

summary.span: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether selective authentication is enabled on the inbound trust relationship with the specified forest.

span.span: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether selective authentication is enabled on the inbound trust relationship with the specified forest.

summary.span: if selective authentication is enabled; otherwise, .

span.span: if selective authentication is enabled; otherwise, .

returns.span: if selective authentication is enabled; otherwise, .

span.span: if selective authentication is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para una confianza de bosque, si opta por la autenticación selectiva, permisos deben habilitarse manualmente en cada dominio y recurso en el bosque local al que desea tener acceso a los usuarios en el otro bosque.For a forest trust, if you opt for selective authentication, permissions must be manually enabled on each domain and resource in the local forest to which you want users in the other forest to have access. Cuando un usuario se autentica a través de una relación de confianza para el que selectiva está habilitada la autenticación, se agrega un identificador (SID) de seguridad de otra organización a los datos de autorización del usuario.When a user authenticates across a trust for which selective authentication is enabled, an Other Organization security ID (SID) is added to the user's authorization data. La presencia de este SID provoca una comprobación en el dominio de recursos para garantizar que el usuario está autorizado para autenticar el servicio concreto.The presence of this SID prompts a check on the resource domain to ensure that the user is allowed to authenticate to the particular service. Cuando el usuario está autenticado, el servidor que autentica el usuario agrega al SID de la organización esta si ya no está presente el SID de otra organización.After the user is authenticated, the server that authenticates the user adds the This Organization SID if the Other Organization SID is not already present. En el contexto de un usuario autenticado sólo puede estar presente uno de estos SID especiales.Only one of these special SIDs can be present in an authenticated user's context.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RaiseForestFunctionality(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestMode forestMode) cil managed

param.name: forestMode
param.span: A enumeration value that specifies the new operation level for the forest.

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the new operation level for the forest.

summary.span: Raises the mode of operation for the forest.

span.span: Raises the mode of operation for the forest.

remarks.format:
## Remarks El valor se puede elevar, pero no Bajar.The value can be raised but not lowered. Esto significa que no es reversible elevar el nivel de funcionalidad del bosque y se debe realizar con cuidado la decisión de hacer esto.This means that raising the functionality level of the forest is not reversible and the decision to do this should be made carefully. Para obtener más información sobre los modos de funcionamiento del bosque, consulte [funcionalidad de dominios y bosques](http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/WindowsServ/2003/standard/proddocs/en-us/sag_levels.asp).For more information about forest operational modes, see [Domain and forest functionality](http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/WindowsServ/2003/standard/proddocs/en-us/sag_levels.asp). La siguiente tabla define los valores válidos para `forestMode` según el modo de funcionamiento actual del bosque.The following table defines the valid values for `forestMode` based on the current operating mode of the forest. |Modo actualCurrent mode|Modo puede elevarse aMode can be raised to| |------------------|---------------------------| ||

| ||| ||NingunaNone|

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetSidFilteringStatus (string targetForestName, bool enable);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetSidFilteringStatus(string targetForestName, bool enable) cil managed
Public Sub SetSidFilteringStatus (targetForestName As String, enable As Boolean)
public: void SetSidFilteringStatus(System::String ^ targetForestName, bool enable);

param.name: targetForestName
param.span: The DNS name of the object with which the trust relationship exists.

span.span: The DNS name of the object with which the trust relationship exists.

param.name: enable
param.span: if SID filtering is to be enabled; otherwise, .

span.span: if SID filtering is to be enabled; otherwise, .

summary.span: Sets the SID filtering state with the specified forest.

span.span: Sets the SID filtering state with the specified forest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks De forma predeterminada, confianzas externas nuevo y bosque en [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)] Active Directory Domain Services aplicar el filtrado de SID.By default, new external and forest trusts in [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)] Active Directory Domain Services enforce SID filtering. El filtrado de SID se utiliza para evitar ataques de usuarios malintencionados que pueden intentar conceder derechos de usuario con privilegios elevados a otra cuenta de usuario.SID filtering is used to prevent attacks from malicious users who might try to grant elevated user rights to another user account. Aplicar el filtrado de SID en confianzas de bosque no impide que las migraciones a dominios dentro del mismo bosque con el historial de SID y no afectará a su estrategia de control de acceso de grupo universal.Enforcing SID filtering on forest trusts does not prevent migrations to domains within the same forest from using SID history and will not affect your universal group access control strategy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método comprueba que se ha establecido una relación de confianza totalmente.This method verifies that a trust relationship has been fully established. La relación de confianza no se establece hasta que se han creado ambos lados de la relación de confianza.The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created.
